headline: Is Sysco (SYY) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Resilience And DCF Outlook
summary: If you are wondering whether Sysco shares still offer value at around US$76.84, it helps to first be clear on what the current price might already be baking in. The stock has been relatively steady, with a 7.2% return over the last year, 5.8% year to date and a recent 3.9% gain over 30 days after a 3.0% pullback in the past week. Recent coverage has focused on Sysco's role as a major foodservice distributor and how it continues to supply restaurants, hospitality, and institutional customers...
